faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about preserving your life story
faq.ctaText: Our team is here to help you get started with your life story.

items.question: Who can see my story?
items.answer: Only you by default. You choose what to share and with whom. Access is protected by secure logins.

items.question: What happens to my data?
items.answer: Your data lives in a secure database with per-user access controls. You can export or delete it anytime.

items.question: Do I need to know exact dates?
items.answer: No‚Äîapproximate dates are fine. You can edit details later.

items.question: Can I add videos and audio?
items.answer: Yes. Short videos (up to ~2 minutes each) and audio notes are supported.

items.question: Is there a way to involve a professional interviewer?
items.answer: Yes. You can book an interviewer at any time. They will help you capture richer stories.

items.question: Can I print a physical book?
items.answer: Yes. Export a high-resolution PDF and take it to any print service. Print partnerships are coming soon.

items.question: Do you support families?
items.answer: Yes. You can collaborate on timelines, and we'll soon support shared family spaces.

items.question: What if I change my mind?
items.answer: You can pause or cancel anytime. Your timeline remains available on the Free plan.

items.question: What languages are supported?
items.answer: We currently support English and German, with more languages on the roadmap.

items.question: Is this suitable for elders?
items.answer: Absolutely. The guided prompts and optional interviewer help make it easy and enjoyable.
